page.title: Getting Started
page.p: In front of you is the power of raw elemental magic. In the world exist the following elements:
Fire
Water
Air
Earth
Light
Darkness
Life
Death

page.title: Casting Spells
page.p: A spell is a series of elements. Each element has an effect and shape. The order of the elements matters, as their effects change depending on the position within the spell.
The first element in the spell defines its primary effect, while subsequent elements will apply modifiers to it.
The last element in the spell will dictate the shape/casting style of the spell.
Having multiple of the same element one after the other will increase the primary effect, while opposite elements will reduce or cancel this effect.
Also, a modifier effect will not be applied if the effect is cancelled by the previous element, but the shape will still apply.

page.title: Effects and Shapes
page.p: Fire causes Flames, in the shape of a Sphere around caster.
Water spawns flowing water, in the shape of a Ball thrown forward.
Air blows things away, in the shape of a Cone in front of the caster.
Earth does things, shape not decided yet.
Light protects and illuminates, the shape is a Beam.
Darkness weakens and darkens, the shape is not yet determined.
Life heals and repairs, these spells are Self-cast.
Death breaks and damages, they take the aspect of Curses.

page.title: Extra Storage
page.p: Gemstones can store elemental essences, but you will have to continuously swap the gemstone in your wands if you rely on that.
A better way to store extra essences is by crafting a ring.

page.title: Improved Casting
page.p: Wands are a perfectly good tool, but they are limited in how much essence they can contain.
Wands can be upgraded into staves, which will double the effective essence amounts in the gemstone, allowing the caster to reach higher spell tiers.

page.title: Rituals
page.p: You believe there may be some way to perform complex interactions by making use of structures built in the world.
Sadly, the specifics of the method escape you. Maybe at a later date, it will be possible.
